channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 6.3.28a source release now available – replaces 6.3.28
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-6-3-28a-source-release-now-available-replaces-6-3-28#comment-258">LinuxJedi</a>.
Andrew - this whole post has now been obsoleted by 6.3.28b now anyway :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to LinuxJedi.

Andrew – this whole post has now been obsoleted by 6.3.28b now anyway ðŸ™‚
